characters: Driver of a black van, cyclist on the left side
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a suburban road. Ahead, a black van is moving steadily. On the left side, a cyclist is riding along the road. The cyclist maintains a consistent speed and does not pose any immediate threat to the vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, following the black van ahead at a safe distance. The vehicle is keeping its lane and does not need to make any sudden maneuvers.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black van, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Left side: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, riding along the road at a consistent speed.
